This black, one shoulder top is super chic and has an expensive appearance to it. The material is super buttery and soft, with minimal elasticity. The fit is my only reason for 4 stars. I ordered a Size Small and the shoulder with the strap didn’t quite fit underneath my arm, so the material pokes out slightly. Also, it shrinks slightly in the wash. For some, it may run slightly small, so I recommend upsizing. Overall, I still love this top and have worn it many times! Just keep in mind of the sizing.

This shirt is cute (on pictures) however it's not what I was expecting. It's more of a spandex type material and very fitting/gripping to the body. I personally would not recommend this to a friend.

评论概述: So flattering and supportive - size down
评论详情: I've never purchased a one-shoulder top before, but this one was too cute to pass up. I was initially a little worried about the bra situation, since I wear a 34DDD. BUT, this top is amazing! Double-lined, stretchy, and SO supportive. No bra needed (even for me).  I took the advice of the other reviewers and sized down to a Small (I'm usually a Medium). It fits perfectly - the bottom hits me just below my belly button (I'm 5'10). If you're in-between sizes, or are worried about having enough support for your chest, I'd recommend sizing down. I'm going to buy more in all the colors!
